labels: level 2; update record; lion; project; cleanup
title: Project: Remove unprintable characters from ROR records
body:
Approximately 200 records have unprintable characters in various fields that interfere with search and other use of the data. These records should all be updated to delete these characters.
[unprintable_characters_20220212.xlsx](https://github.com/ror-community/ror-updates/files/8054981/unprintable_characters_20220212.xlsx)
comments:
adambuttrick
02/13/2022, 04:49:06 | 02/13/2022, 04:49:06
comment_text: https://ror.org/02jh2mm49 (Issue #310) will be corrected in the first release.

---
adambuttrick
02/16/2022, 16:31:05 | 02/16/2022, 16:31:05
comment_text: After discussion with @lizkrznarich, these use a valid escape syntax and so should not be deleted. We should update the search API to accommodate.

adambuttrick
08/09/2022, 22:25:54 | 08/09/2022, 22:25:54
comment_text: Whitespace can be normalized.

labels: level 3; lion; hold for later; project; cleanup
title: Project: Remove errant last characters in record name, alias, acronym, and label fields
Project: Standardize types for geological surveys
body: Geological surveys in ROR are not categorized consistently: some records use "Government," some "Nonprofit," some "Other," etc. We should analyze the variations and use cases and then recommend and apply standard categorization.

labels: level 2; update record; lion; project; cleanup
title: Project: Countries in Name Field
body:
GRID previously assigned country to all records with the type, "Company." We should clean these records up as follows:

1. Find all records with (country) in name [attached spreadsheet]
2. Identify which of above have no duplicates, and remove (country) from name
3. Confirm (country) matches Geonames country
4. Investigate usecases for having more than one record
5. Investigate search handling to optimize retrieval of duplicates with same name in different countries
6. Review duplicates and identify which ones can/should be merged
7. For duplicates that remain, remove (country) from name
[20220622_names_w_country_names.xlsx](https://github.com/ror-community/ror-updates/files/8960415/20220622_names_w_country_names.xlsx)

title: Project: Duplicate names in alias, label, and acronym fields
body:
509 records have a name which is duplicated in another name field. These should be reviewed and corrected, where appropriate.

[20220815_duplicate_names.xlsx](https://github.com/ror-community/ror-updates/files/9339005/20220815_duplicate_names.xlsx)
.
